Segment: Legacy CC plans: Developer, Org Standard, Org Elite
Email 1

Hi XXX,

Thank you for being a valued member of the Bitrise community. We’re writing to share an update regarding some upcoming pricing changes that will take effect in 2025.

Over the past three years, we’ve rolled out a range of new features to deliver more value for you and your team. To keep pace with inflation and rising operating costs—and to ensure we can keep innovating and improving—we’ll be adjusting our prices accordingly.

New Pricing Details:

  • Effective January 1, 2025, the price of your plan will increase by approximately 7%.
  • This will take effect on your next renewal (no action from you needed).

Segment: Teams V2 (Tier 1-6)- Current pricing
Email 1

Hi XXX,

Thank you for being a valued member of the Bitrise community. We’re writing to share an update regarding some upcoming pricing changes that will take effect in 2025.

Over the past three years, we’ve rolled out a range of new features to deliver the best possible platform for you and your team. To keep pace with inflation and rising operating costs—and to ensure we can keep innovating and improving—there will be a small price increase on our legacy plans in 2025.

New Pricing Details:

  • Your plan will increase by approximately 5% starting January 1, 2025.
  • The new list price increase will take effect at your next renewal—no action is required from you.
